properties.description: Recycled paper is used to make home insulation.  The insulation is then shipped to hardware stores around the nation, and installed in consumers homes.
properties.address: 136 S Keowee St, Dayton, OH 45402, USA
properties.title: CIMA

properties.description: The consumer uses the paper.  The consumer then has a choice as to what to do with the used product.  The product can be discarded, and sent to the landfill.  The consumer could also recycle the paper at a facility like Tri-state resource recovery.  Other options for the consumer using the paper for insulation, or used as compost.
properties.title: Consumer

properties.description: Paper that is thrown away by a consumer ends up at a landfill.  The paper sits in this landfill, until it decomposes.  However, there are some recycling companies that recover paper from landfills and recycle it.
properties.title: LAUBSCHER MEADOWS LANDFILl

properties.description: Paper arrives from the distribution center, and is sold to consumers.
properties.address: 401 N Burkhardt Rd, Evansville, IN 47715, USA
properties.title: Walmart

properties.description: Walmart Distribution center.  Paper milled in Camas, OR is shipped to a Walmart distribution center like the one in Indianapolis, IN.
properties.title: Indianapolis Indiana

properties.description: The Georgia-Pacific paper mill in Camas Oregon produce much of Americas printer paper.  This paper mill produces about 500,000 tons of printer paper every year, which takes about 6,000,000 trees annually.
properties.title: Camas, Oregon

properties.description: Privately owned tree plantations like the one in Rincon GA grow trees for use as raw materials in paper making.  These tree farms are managed by these companies to be sustainable.  However, these tree farms rarely produce enough lumber to meet the needs of American industry.
properties.title: Rincon, Georgia
Tri-state resource recovery
properties.description: The paper is recovered, and reprocessed into raw material. The raw paper making material is then shipped back to the paper mill where it is remade into usable paper.

properties.footprintmethodology:
CO2e factor referenced from: 
(2010) Okala Design Guide 2010
properties.description: Raw Materials are shipped from the Plantation in Georgia to the production site in Oregon by truck.
properties.title: Rincon, Georgia to Camas, Oregon

properties.description: Finished Paper product is shipped to the distribution centers.
properties.title: Camas, Oregon to Indianapolis Indiana
properties.footprintmethodology:
CO2e factor referenced from: 
(2010) Okala Design Guide 2010

properties.title: Tri-state resource recovery to Camas, Oregon
